22.eng-name: Oaths and Vows (Kitab Al-Aiman Wa Al-Nudhur)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Abbas:Sa'd b. 'Ubadah asked the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ): My Mother has died and she could not fulfill her vow which she had taken. The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: Fulfill it on her behalf

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي قَضَاءِ النَّذْرِ عَنِ الْمَيِّتِ
chapter.eng-name: Fulfilling A Vow On Behalf Of One Who Had Died
